chapters.title: Chapter 18:  The Strength of This Place
chapters.info: Lieutenant Lidrin, p. 266—Young, hard-eyed officer under General Ituralde's command. He has a scar on his face and a thin, stylish black mustache. He began Ituralde's campaign having never known real combat, but he is a seasoned veteran now. His father died under Ituralde's service; he went insane shortly before the end.
